title: Visual Aesthetic Utilization Strategies in [K-12] Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where entry-level science learners in administrative/managerial roles combine theory and practice using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze visual elements (colors, layouts, graphics) in online platforms and suggest ways to improve learning immersion
Learners can create infographics that express scientific concepts as visual metaphors
Learners can design a peer assessment system utilizing visual feedback

resources: Free design tools such as Canva

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
